message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that price for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $75 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $82 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product. Can you do that?
I understand that $78 is still a bit lower than I'd like, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $85 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
